column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Our waiter was funny
column2: although I doubt he intended to be. He has his spiel perfected. My boyfriend was being dull
column3: so I eavesdropped on everyone else's conversations
column4: and our waiter had the same greeting for every table: "Welcome to Lou Malnati's! Is this your first visit? Just to let you know
column5: our pizza takes about 35 minutes to cook. I'd suggest you start off with the Malnati salad - it's the best salad you'll ever have. Are you guys hungry? The small pizza is usually good for 2
column6: unless you want to take some home. Are you ready to order?" I have no life.
